description:
There needs to be ability, while moving between clouds, to import a instance into nova database, from X rbd pool, if RBD pool cloud can connect to. 
Right now - 

I am able to cp or snap/clone between two rbd pools, and or by doing "rbd mv src target" (within same pool). I keep cinder volume as placeholder by deleting rbd volume under that, and then with above method populate cinder volume back. And make it bootable. 

Whereas I see, all this should be possible through API or CLI calls ..
title: Importing a instance from RBD backend

comments.content:
There needs to be ability, while moving between clouds, to import a instance into nova database, from X rbd pool, if RBD pool cloud can connect to.
